channel.title: Brand Y.Z. | Code & Education
channel.description: Recent content on Brand Y.Z. | Code & Education

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Professional Background Link to heading

I hold a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Software Engineering from Southwest University, graduating in 2017.

With a solid foundation in computer science and years of professional experience in C++ and Python server-side development, I have developed a keen eye for clean code and efficient system architecture.

My Mission in Education Link to heading

Today, I am transitioning into the field of K-12 Programming Education. I specialize in:

item.title: From Backend to Blackboard: Bringing Engineering Logic to the Classroom
item.description:
The New Chapter: My Transition Story Link to heading

[English] After years of deep diving into C++ and Python server-side logic and navigating through personal health challenges that tested my resilience, I’ve found a new mission. My journey from a software engineer to a coding educator isn’t just a career change—it’s a commitment to passing on the torch of logic and creativity. I’m here to bridge the gap between rigorous industrial development and the boundless curiosity of young minds.
